entry.title: $2290 // Reno 2 bdrm-Backyard--laundry,D/N/R train, A/C! no fee
entry.content:
Modern newly renovated 2 bdrm! Loaded with amenities!!NO FEE.

BACKYARD, LAUNDRY, CENTRAL AIR, DISHWASHER, VIDEO INTERCOM!

*******2 blocks to the DNR trains at 25th street station.******

Magnificent apt in Greenwood Heights, neighboring Park slope and Gowanus.

Features:
Central A/C
Laundry in building
virtual doorman / video intercom
Dishwasher!!! refrigerator, gas range, microwave convection oven
Modern stainless kitchen
Magnficent granite countertops
High ceilings
Sleek hardwood floors
Big bright windows throughout, one unit has skylight too.
Huge open living / dining area with skylight!
Cats ok, small dogs ok, med-large dogs upon approval.
Modern new bathroom
Shared Yard Access!

(some pics may be from a lower floor unit in the building, but is very much the same).

Steps to much Dining and Shopping!

NO FEES! NO APPLICATION / CREDIT CHECK FEE!!

Good credit necessary!

!!GET APPROVAL WITHIN 24 HOURS OF SUBMITTING APPLICATION!!!

Call or text Idy to schedule a veiwing at show contact info




Greenwood,sunset park, gowanus, park slope, prospect park, brooklyn

entry.title: $1900 // LOVELY 2 BEDROOM APARTMENT IN SUNSET PARK.
entry.content:
Don't miss the opportunity to rent this very spacious 2 bedroom apartment. Queen size bedrooms, hardwood floors, high ceilings, natural light all thought out, very clean, new appliances in the kitchen, closets and lots of space.
Heat and hot water are included.
Call or Email VERONICA today to view your new home.

entry.title: $1850 // 2 BEDROOM APARTMENT IN PRIME LOCATION
entry.content:
Absolutely lovely SUNNY 2BR w/HWF*SEPARATE KITCHEN*SEPARATE BRS

We are offering this lovely 2 bedroom apartment featuring:

*2 Completely Separate Bedrooms.

*kitchen with stove and refrigerator.

*Bathroom with full tub and vanity

call now to view show contact info

3XS $1850 and $100 APPLICATION FEE (for each tenant and each guarantor)

2017 W2 FORM, SOCIAL SECURITY CARD, PHOTO ID, RECENT PAYSTUBS, LETTER OF EMPLOYMENT, BANK STATEMENTS, GOOD CREDIT!!! MUST MAKE 40XS THE RENT, WE DO ACCEPT GUARANTORS (must make 80xs the rent)

NO "OFF THE BOOKS" JOBS ACCEPTED

PLEASE CALL, TEXT OR EMAIL NOW TO VIEW:
